ygData.subject: Re: Bards and Mob Hate
ygData.msgSnippet: From my vast research, I have discovered that buffing yourself or other people in your party while in combat can really hurt the mob s feelings and he will try
ygData.messageBody:
From my vast research, I have discovered that buffing yourself or other
people in your party while in combat can really hurt the mob's feelings and
he will try to go after yah, and the majority of our songs are buffing, or
debuffing. (combat at least). But things like just standing in the middle
of everfrost, and all of a sudden a band of skeletons jumps you must a mob
specific aggresive trait. Another combat reason for mob hate towards us, is
our naturally lower hp than most hybrids.
-----Original Message-----
From: Datlon Handy <dhandy@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Sunday, August 08, 1999 11:50 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards and Mob Hate


>From: Datlon Handy <dhandy@...>
>
>Something I've noticed in a great many zones (I love to travel and we do it
>very fast, very early) is that there are a great many creature types that
don't
>seem to like music.. Perhaps they just don't appreciate its gentle rythm
and
>cadence, but I happened upon a document in Everfrost the other day about a
>named skeleton called 'vengeful lyric'.. Someone who was looking for Karg
>Icebear out near the entrance to Permafrost said that he had just seen this
>skel take off like a shot.. I didn't think anything about it at the time,
but I
>had just started playing Selo's at the entrance to Halas..
>
>Within mere seconds this mob was all over me.. he was way too big for me to
>kill (yet).. But I firmly believe that there are creatures that DO NOT
like
>bards instinctively.. as a list the following creatures dislike my bard
more
>than they dislike my Warrior (same level, race and have killed the same
>creatures)
>
>beetles (all)
>undead (greater and magic hit only it seems)
>griffons
>evil eyes
>plague rats
>
>Hope this helps.. Still need to look into others, but I'll let you know.
>
>Milistrious Songspinner
>Bard of the Elves of Kelethin
>Brell Serilis
>
>silky@... wrote:
>
>> From: silky@...
>>
>> Ok, I've read a lot on this list about how badly the critters hate us,
>> never really experienced it till last night.
>>
>> I expected it to come from me healing my group - the way it happened was
a
>> bit of a surprise.
>>
>> I was showing the group I was with what twisting guardian and protective
>> rythms did for their resistance with a drum, and good god - every
greater,
>> db and barbed skele on our side of unrest was making a beeline for ME!
>>
>> We probably could have handled it had I known the reaction was gonna be
>> like that, and I sure as heck would have run quicker - thankfully, I am
the
>> only one that died.
>>
>> I was only affecting my group - these things came from out of NOWHERE -
why
>> would this act like such a magnet?
>>
>> Anyway - I think I'm gonna get a really good group together (one that can
>> handle that kind of heat) - and do it purposefully (a little less long)
and
>> we won't need to debate on who the puller is anymore - looks like I'm
>> nominated as bait.
